name: IschemicStrokeICD9CM
title: Ischemic Stroke ICD9CM
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values identifies patients who have had a stroke caused by ischemia, where the blood supply is restricted to an area of the brain by something like thrombosis or an embolism.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category or attribute related to Diagnosis. The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have a diagnosis of ischemic stroke, or stroke caused by ischemia.),(Inclusion Criteria: Only use codes which represent a diagnosis of ischemic stroke, or stroke caused by ischemia.  Codes used are to be ICD9CM only.),(Exclusion Criteria: None.)

Occlusion and stenosis of unspecified precerebral artery with cerebral infarction
Cerebral thrombosis without mention of cerebral infarction
Cerebral artery occlusion, unspecified with cerebral infarction
